title: RIOT PLS ADVISE!!!!!!
body:
I just had a ranked game where i dced again and again and again! THIS NEVER HAPPENS TO ME! My net was up and running perfectly you tube facebook and all other apps ran fine. Is this a bug or glitch? my team won game but at the end i got a message asking me not to afk i believe that afking stack and then you get punished i feel that it is unfair i get punished for bug glitch / idk what look at my match history i never afk is there anything i can do to remove afk punishment or stop this happening again i say again there was nothing wrong with my net and my chat worked fine in game??? i feel unfairly reported by my team :( sorry for the rant RIOT PLS HELP (if you can) idk how to post vid of game soz tell me how and ill happily do it if need be


#summonerfeelingrippedoff

replies.body: PS scared to play ranked now incase it happens again when game starts i get message saying i need to update my drivers or lol may crash although i have played lol for almost 2 years with out having to update driver could this have something to do with it?
What program told you to update your drivers?

> [{quoted}](name=HORSE OF FORCE,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=N97YUNEv,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-01-09T01:28:18.938+0000)
>
> What program told you to update your drivers?

Detected an old video driver that maycrash League of Legends. Please update you graphics card drivers. A guide to help you update your drivers should open automatically after closing this window. Or, please visit support.riotgames.com for additional help.              This is the message i get before game starts but game does start and the heading is just   Error?

I did not know that League has driver detectors. If your game is running fine, as in the graphics and frame rates are good, then it wouldn't be anything to do with your grahics driver. Do not update it; most of the time the one that came with the card is the best one (or the one that was already installed when you got the computer).

Who is your ISP and have you experienced this lag before?

Do not update it; most of the time the one that came with the card is the best one (or the one that was already installed when you got the computer).
> 
> Who is your ISP and have you experienced this lag before?

Telstra and only in 3 games spaced over like 6 months but last one was in ranked game The computer I built myself and using windows 7 all runs fine recently the cpu has been overheating though gets up to 60'C  but i combat that by opening the side and putting a swivel fan on it XD game runs perfectly with graphics turned all the way up normally sit on 30 35 ping

Hm... I'm thinking it might be related to how a bunch of people currently can't log on to the servers. If that's the case then you can just wait it out; it'll be fixed.

It's not likely your ISP, Telstra have a generally good reputation. It's TPG and Dodo you need to watch out for.

So, for the moment, don't upgrade your graphics. Reset your computer, connection and everything relevant. Make sure your DNS is set manually, clear your caches and set your Internet Explorer settings back to default (then set security to low). We need some time to see what's causing this exactly.
